properties.displayName: Suspicious High IntegrityLevel Conhost Legacy Option
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "conhost.exe" and ProcessCommandLine contains "0xffffffff" and ProcessCommandLine contains "-ForceV1") and ProcessIntegrityLevel =~ "High"

tags.name: description
tags.value: ForceV1 asks for information directly from the kernel space. Conhost connects to the console application. High IntegrityLevel means the process is running with elevated privileges, such as an Administrator conte
